sourcesContent:
import { createSlice } from '@reduxjs/toolkit'
import gameField from './Gamefield'

import { current } from '@reduxjs/toolkit'
import reducers from "./reducers"

const turns = {
	b: 'w',
	w: 'b',
}

const initialState = {
	gameField,
	turn: 'w',
	colors: ['rgb(255,195,151)', 'rgb(39,39,39)'],
	selected: null,
	nextMoves: [],
	check: null,
	previousMove: [],
	castlingMoved: [],
	promoted: null,
	coverMoves: [],
	enpassing: null,
}

const chessSlice = createSlice({
	name: 'chess',
	initialState,
	reducers,
})

export default chessSlice.reducer

export const {
	clearNextMoves,
	setNextMoves,
	setCheck,
	setTurn,
	setSelected,
	setFollowing,
	setCoverMoves,
	movePiece,
	castle,
	setPromoted,
} = chessSlice.actions
